column4: hello,who can help me.i am install ubuntu6.06 live-cd again,the error has returned.I am from china,i'm english is to bad,pardon me.
hello,who can help me.i am install ubuntu6.06 live-cd again,the error has returned.I am from china,i'm english is too bad,pardon me.
don't go to ubuntu-cn, ask your questions here
you can not install to a livecd, can you install to your hard drive?
okay, why are you making so many partitions?
okay, booting problem? can you mount the partitions, and chroot to it
if you are sure about the installation, and the problem is no more than booting, you can follow the grub howto
first, I would think your disk is in a very bad shape, if it's not too late, I suggest you to re-install
you have so many partitions, quite not reasonable sizes, and reiserfs is known to be unstable
okay, do you know which partition is your / partition?
if you have no idea, do: sudo grub
that should lead you to the grub command line, then, do: find /etc/hosts
read the grub howto, if you want to understand more
I suggest you to reinstall, if /dev/hda1 is your / partition, it's too small (at 2GB), and you have the space
